tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task
tasks.description: The chart below shows information about fuel used in the transport sector in different countries in Europe, compared to the EU average, in 2009 and 2010.

images.altText: Chart showing fuel used in transport sector in European countries

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Some people think that planning for the future is a waste of time. They believe it is more important to focus on the present. To what extent agree or disagree?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
